channel.title: 667/704 Need help on basic editing the client (Disturbed)
channel.description:
Hello everyone
I want to learn 667/704. I downloaded the "Disturbed" source and client. I've done basic things, but not the very basics lol. I'm wondering where I can change my client's title etc. I've tried "Loader.java" and "Gamestub.java" but it didnt work. I have TeamViewer, MSN, Skype.
Thank you. ;)

item.title: 667/704 Need help on basic editing the client (Disturbed)
item.dc:creator: @cashis000 cashis000
item.description:
@cashis000 wrote:

[quote=“Snackman, post:5, topic:438612”]to help you out, since I guess no-one will:

go to Settings.java (in your client)

you’ll see stuff like this:

public final static String serverName = "Disturbed"; public final static String WEBSITE = "http:/www.Disturbed.com"; public final static String QUIT_URL = "http://www.Disturbed.com/";
Just edit that to your likings ;)[/quote]

but then u have to compile the client dont forget

Read full topic
item.source: 667/704 Need help on basic editing the client (Disturbed)
